CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 13, 1938, pg. 8, reads: "Eckstein - Sawyer Wedding Party - Socialites expressed no little interest in wedding of popular Miss Aileen Eckstein and Mr. Roland M. Sawyer, Saturday in the Church of the Holy Cross. In the photo, front row, Miss Toni Westmoreland, maid of honor; Mr. Sawyer, the groom; Mrs. Sawyer, the bride; Mrs. Maxine Eckstein Whedbee, matron of honor.  Second row, Mrs. Katherine Smith, Mrs. Mabel Page Johnson, Mrs. Lena Jett Cessor and Mrs. Aileen Briggs Young, bridesmaids."Cutline of related image published in Flash Newspicture Magazine September 6, 1938, pg. 22, reads: "Social Conscious Pittsburgh nodded their felicitations on the occasion of the beautiful Sawyer - Eckstein nuptials.  First row, l. to r., Toni Westmoreland, maid of honor, Roland Sawyer and Aileen Sawyer, Maxine Eckstein Wedbey, matron of honor, Mabel Page Johnson, Aileen Briggs Young, Katherine George Smith and Lena Jett Cessor."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of bride Aileen Eckstein Sawyer wearing long sheer train, posed on steps of The Thimble Shop, 5913 Bryant Street, Highland Park
